es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica6.net

Class ObjectEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica6.net.ObjectEndpoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SocketEndpoint
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameClient

    public abstract class ObjectEndpoint
extends java.lang.Object
implements SocketEndpoint
    A SocketEndpoint that sends and receives objects via serialization, making no assumptions about the data to be listened to or sent.
